alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 05 at 3:17AM MDT until April 06 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning has been in effect from 11 AM until 7 PM Tuesday for strong winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 226...227...230...233 and 237, which includes El Paso county, the lower elevations of Las Animas county, and Baca county... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued for Wednesday from 11AM to 9PM for strong winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 224 and 226 through 237, which includes the San Luis Valley and all of the plains... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 226... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 226... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM this morning to 7 PM MDT this evening. A Red Flag Warning has also been issued from 11 AM to 9 PM MDT Wednesday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 226. * Winds...Northwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread Tuesday and again on Wednesday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest
